title: STAT+: Slashing of U.S. vaccine schedule creates new uncertainty on manufacturers’ legal protections
description: RFK Jr.’s allies hope reducing the number of recommended pediatric vaccines opens the door to stripping vaccine makers of the liability shields.
content: RFK Jr.’s allies hope reducing the number of recommended pediatric vaccines opens the door to stripping vaccine makers of the liability shields.
